title: 3 Easy Ways to Add a New Workplace on Facebook

steps.title: Open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app. This looks like a white f on a blue background. If you aren't logged into Facebook, enter your email address (or phone number) and password to log in. Facebook is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store .

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This will be at the bottom-right corner (iOS) or top-right corner (Android).

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. Your profile page will open.

steps.title: Tap Edit Profile.
steps.content: Tap Edit Profile . A new page will open.

steps.title: Tap Add.
steps.content: Tap Add . This will be to the right of the Details header.

steps.title: Tap Add work.
steps.content: Tap Add work . You can find this at the top, underneath the Work header.

steps.title: Enter a company.
steps.content: Enter a company. Before you can fill additional details, you must enter a company in the Workplace Name field. Begin typing, then select it from the suggested list. [1] X Research source You can adjust your privacy settings by tapping Public and selecting: Friends, Friends except…, Specific friends, or Only me.

steps.title: Enter additional details (optional).
steps.content: Enter additional details (optional). You can add a Job Title, Location, and Description. Toggle on Currently work here if this is your current job. Adjust your start date by tapping the drop-down menu for year, month, and date.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . Your new workplace will be saved to your profile. [2] X Research source On mobile, you may be prompted to share this new workplace as a New Life Event . Tap Share to do so now, or you can create a Life Event manually . If needed, tap Save again to apply your changes.

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com in a web browser. By default, your home page should be your feed. If you aren't logged in, enter your email address (or phone number) and password in the upper-right side of the page to log in, or create a new account .

steps.title: Click your profile icon.
steps.content: Click your profile icon. This will be at the top of the left panel. You'll be taken to your profile page. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Click About.
steps.content: Click About . This is the tab underneath your profile picture, between Posts and Friends . [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click Work and education.
steps.content: Click Work and education . This will be on the left panel.

steps.title: Click Add a workplace.
steps.content: Click Add a workplace . You can find this underneath the Work header. Clicking this will expand the section with

steps.title: Complete the forms.
steps.content: Complete the forms. You can add the Company, Position, City/Town, Description, and Time Period. Official pages for these categories will appear as you type. Click it to add it to the field. Check the box next to I currently work here if this is your current job. You can use the drop-down menu next to From to set a start year. By default, this information will be public. To change your privacy settings , click Public and select: Friends, Friends except…, Specific friends, Only me, or Custom.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . This is at the bottom-right of the form. Your new workplace will be saved to your profile.

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com in a web browser or open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com in a web browser or open the Facebook app. By default, your home page should be your feed. [5] X Research source If you aren't logged in, enter your email address (or phone number) and password in the upper-right side of the page to log in. Use this method if you want to create and share a post about your new workplace.

steps.title: Click What's on your mind?.
steps.content: Click What's on your mind? . This will open a dialogue box.

steps.title: Click the "Life event" icon.
steps.content: Click the "Life event" icon. This looks like a teal flag. On mobile, you may need to swipe up to reveal all available options.

steps.title: Click Work.
steps.content: Click Work . This will be underneath a briefcase icon.

steps.title: Click Enter a title….
steps.content: Click Enter a title… . This will open a new window. You can also select a template by clicking: New Job, Promotion, Left Job, or Retirement.

steps.title: Complete the forms.
steps.content: Complete the forms. You must include a title for your Life event. You can also add a description and the date of the event. Change your audience by clicking Friends and selecting: Friends, Friends except…, Specific friends, Only me, or Custom. To change the image, click one of the preset images in the bottom-left corner of the image. Alternatively, click Photos/Videos to browse your device for an image.

steps.title: Click Share.
steps.content: Click Share . This will post your Life event to your feed. Approved friends with be able to like, comment, and share your Life event.
